steps.title: Add Post
steps.content:
Here you can:
  • Add new post
  • Assign a parent post (Reporting post)
  • Can Activate/Deactivate post
  • Define if employee/employees under this particular post can Create Team

steps.title: Post
steps.content: This shows all the Posts in your selected department

steps.title: Parent post
steps.content: This shows the Parent post (reporting post) of the corresponding post

steps.title: Is Active
steps.content:
Here:
  • Shows an active post
    •
  • Shows an inactive post

steps.title: Can Create Team
steps.content:
Here:
  • Shows post can create Team
    •
  • Shows post can't create team

steps.title: Employee count
steps.content: Shows total number of Employees in particular post of the selected department

steps.title: Employees
steps.content:
Here you can see Name of all the employee associated with corresponding post of the selected department

Note: To get full information or to edit information about any employee go to [Menu Hr >> employee]

steps.title: DocumentAcl
steps.content:
Here you can See/Add/Remove the Document Access Rights given to corresponding post of the selected department

Example: Sales Manager can see every Employee's submitted quotations and can approve them whereas Sales Executive can only see it's own submitted documents and cannot perform any action on them.

steps.title: Edit
steps.content:
This action allows you to Edit:
  • post
  • parent post (Reporting post)
  • Can Activate/Deactivate post
  • Can Activate/Deactivate Create Team

steps.title: Delete
steps.content:
This action allows you to Delete a particular post

NOTE: You cannot delete posts which are reporting posts or have employees in them. To delete you have to remove that particular post from the reporting post if it is.
